name: Astro scuffle
description:
IMPORTANT - The only way to get out of the game is to press windows then close the tab.

This a 3d game made in unity where you (and a friend) fly around in spaceships trying to shoot each other. This is only a prototype and is very buggy and unfinished.

Controls - 

player 1 - shoot = Shift,          stop = Space,           turn = W,A,S,D

player 2 - shoot = period,         stop = Comma,          turn = Arrow Keys

IMPORTANT - if left and right are mixed up, you're upside down.
